content: Medium metal reciprocating saw blades Reciprocating saw blades for cutting 3-8 mm (1/8 - 5/16) thick metal ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Economical bimetal blades optimized for cutting medium-thick metal pipes, plates, structures etc. Thin kerf for more flexibility – the ideal blade for flush cuts Three lengths available – choosing the right length based on the shape of your workpiece can increase comfort and efficiency Applications Rough, faster cuts through medium-thick metal plate (3-8 mm or 1/8 - 5/16) Flush cuts Cutting bar stock Cutting angle iron Cutting solid pipes ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Standard Shank: 1/2 in universal shank Teeth per inch: 14 Technical Data | Product Class | Standard | Shank | 1/2 in universal shank | Teeth per inch | 14 | Blade features | Fast cut, Economic, Flexible ### ITEMS- 2099395 - Recip. saw blade P 6 14 (5) metal - Package Size 5 pc - 2099349 - Recip. saw blade P 6 14 (50) metal - Package Size 50 pc - 3889037 - Metal Recip blade P 15 14 (200 pcs) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 200x Recip. saw blade P 6 14 (50) metal - 3889035 - Metal Recip blade P 20 14 (200 pcs) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 200x Recip. saw blade P 8 14 (50) metal - 2099396 - Recip. saw blade P 8 14 (5) metal - Package Size 5 pc - 2099350 - Recip. saw blade P 8 14 (50) metal - Package Size 50 pc - 2099228 - Recip. saw blade P 20 14 (200) metal - Package Size 200 pc
